text: Welcome {name} to {company_name} Education Services. You have successfully enrolled in text message notifications.

email.subject: Your bulk import of students has completed.
email.body:
Hey {email},

This email is being sent to notify you that your bulk import of students for file: {file_name} has been completed.

While adding students, {failed_amount} failed.

{failed_users_text}

{failed_users}

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}

E: {company_email}
